name: Diving Date
description:
Join a scuba dog and an otter on their Diving Date!

Diving Date is a peaceful, non-interactive experience that you can play in your browser. Enjoy the soothing music and hand-drawn visuals. You can click to move the camera, but it'll move on its own too.

This game can be played fullscreen here.

Programming: Caelyn Sandel
Art: Kara Hurvitz and Caelyn Sandel
Music: "Rain Poem", by Jamie Sandel

Written for Love Jam 2014 and Flying Toast With Jam
